name: Acquittal
description:
After 5 years of searching, you’ve finally decided to get in contact with your only child. You would think that this letter I got in the mail would say something like “Hey son how are you? Is mother ok? Are you seeing a special lady?”, but nope, it’s just some cryptic message saying “SHUT IT DOWN”. After all this time that’s what you can muster up, wow.

Acquittal is a FPS exploration game set in a dry forest in the city of, Houston Texas. You're sole mission is simple, FIND DAD.  As you progress, you'll hear strange noises coming from the direction of the forest. Could it be?

For future games: https://www.instagram.com/jaybornflloyd/
